commands.verInfo: This server runs GreenFrogMCBE. Version: %version% | Repository: https://github.com/andriycraft/GreenFrogMCBE
commands.ingameOpDescription: Grants operator status to a player
commands.ingameKickDescription: Kicks a player off a server
commands.ingameSayDescription: Displays a message to multiple players
commands.ingameDeopDescription: Revokes operator status from a player
commands.deopFail: Failed to remove OP status from that player
commands.opFail: Failed to give OP status to that player
commands.gamemodeSurvival: Your gamemode has been updated to Survival
commands.gamemodeCreative: Your gamemode has been updated to Creative
commands.gamemodeAdventure: Your gamemode has been updated to Adventure
commands.gamemodeSpectator: Your gamemode has been updated to Spectator
commands.gamemodeUpdated: Your gamemode has been updated to

kickmessages.resourcePacksRefused: §cYou must accept resource packs to join this server
kickmessages.invalidPacket: §cEncountered an error while trying to handle packet from your client

errors.debugWarning: Debug is enabled! Use this only if you are developer and never use this thing in production
errors.failedToExecuteEvent: Failed to execute %event% event for plugin "%plugin%". The error was: %e%
errors.packetHandlingException: Exception while trying to handle packet from %player%: %error%
errors.illegalMessage: %player% sent an invalid message. Message content was: %msg%
errors.playerUnknownCommandOrNoPermission: §cUnknown command: %commandname%. Please check that the command exists and that you have permission to use it.
errors.failedToLoadPlugin: Failed to load plugin "%name%". The error was: %errorstack%
errors.failedToExecFunction: Failed to execute function in plugin "%plugin%". Error: %e%
errors.invalidUsernameWarning: I am sorry, but %player%'s username contains spaces, but they are not implemented in GreenFrog yet, so i replaced spaces with underscores
errors.otherServerRunning: This usually means that another server is already running on this port
errors.packetErrorOffline: An attempt to handle packet from offline player
errors.targetServerNull: Packet processing error: The target server is null!
errors.sendToInvalidServer: Packet processing error: The target server port is invalid! Must be number between 0 and 65535
errors.itemExploit: An attempt to get items from creative mode, while the player is not in creative mode
errors.failedToHandleItemRequest: Failed to handle item request from %data%
errors.notSupportedActionID: Not supported packet data: packet = open_inventory, action_id = %ai%
errors.packageJSONError: Failed to find/read or parse package.json for this plugin %plugin%. Make sure that the package.json contains version, name, and main file
errors.failedToLoadWorld: Make sure the chunks.json and gamerules.json exist, and make sure that the file is valid JSON!

devdebug.unstableWarning: Unstable mode is enabled! This may make your server unstable and will cause more lag
